name: Perspective Cardcase
description: The Perspective Cardcase is designed with the desire for something a little less square. The unique shape and slim design sets it apart while remaining functional- fitting perfectly in your front or back pocket. It is made from premium European natural veg-tan cowhide that will darken to a rich caramel/brown with use, age, and sunlight. Everything is cut, punched, sewn, assembled, and finished by hand without the use of machines. Just pure muscle power and traditional methods are used to create a unique item that will age beautifully and last ages. Free monogramming available- up to 3 letters. Send message at checkout if monogramming is desired. Details: -1 card slot -1 dust bag for storage Specs: dimensions: 5"x3.25"x0.125" (at longest and widest point) material: -premium European natural vegetable-tanned cowhide -heavy duty waxed thread for added strength and durability process: -hand cut -stitch channel grooved -hand punched holes -logo stamped -waxed and hand polished -hand burnished -assembled and hand stitched with saddle stitch *please note: due to the handcrafted nature of this product, there may be slight variations or imperfections that should not be regarded as defects, but as part of the unique character of each lovingly handmade item

name: Belt Keeper Lanyard
description: The Belt Keeper Lanyard is designed to be worn on a belt while keeping attachable wallets secure, within reach, but also the perfect length to keep them stashed in your pocket. Can also be looped around bag handles with keys for easy access. Made from thick 5oz. natural vegetable-tanned cowhide that with develop a beautiful caramel/brown patina with use, age, and sunlight. This cardcase is hand cut, handsewn, hand assembled, and hand burnished and polished for an individual feel. Features a stainless steel shackle for attaching keys or our Criss-cross Cardcase (sold separately). Free monogramming available- up to 3 letters. Send message at checkout if monogramming is desired. Details: -Constructed from a single piece of leather, that can be unlooped to carry flat -1/4" stainless steel shackle for secure connection to your keys or cardcase -1 dust bag for storage Specs: dimensions: ~7" long when looped or 10" long when unlooped 3.5" at widest point and 0.5" at narrowest point materials: -5.oz natural vegetable-tanned cowhide -1/4" stainless steel shackle hardware process: -hand cut -hand punched holes -logo stamped -waxed and hand polished -edges beveled and hand burnished -assembled and hand stitched with saddle stitch *please note: due to the handcrafted nature of this product, there may be slight variations or imperfections that should not be regarded as defects, but as part of the unique character of each lovingly handmade item Fancy

name: Chris-cross Cardcase
description: This cardcase was the result of a challenge from a mate to design the most simple cardcase I could think of. Cardcases are already incredibly simple, but this one takes it one step further. Essentially a card-harness, the Chris-cross Cardcase is suitable as primary card and cash carry, or use it as an additional cardcase to carry all those vip cards that we all amass. Made from premium European natural vegetable-tanned cowhide that with develop a beautiful caramel/brown patina with use, age, and sunlight. This cardcase is hand cut, handsewn, hand assembled, and hand burnished and polished for an individual feel. Features a snap closure and D-ring to attach it to a lanyard. Specifically designed to be carried with our Belt Keeper Lanyard (sold separately). Free monogramming available- up to 3 letters. Send message at checkout if monogramming is desired. Details: -carries at least 10 cards and folded bills (may carry more as leather softens with use -secure snap closure for easy access -D-ring for attachment to lanyard, keys, etc. -1 dust bag for storage Specs: dimensions: about 3.75"x2.5"x1" materials: -premium European natural vegetable-tanned cowhide -brass hardware process: -hand cut -hand punched holes -logo stamped -waxed and hand polished -edges beveled and hand burnished -assembled and hand stitched with saddle stitch *please note: due to the handcrafted nature of this product, there may be slight variations or imperfections that should not be regarded as defects, but as part of the unique character of each lovingly handmade item Fancy

name: Orion Belt in Black
description: This belt is crafted from durable 10oz. premium European natural veg-tan cowhide that has been hand-dyed to a rich black. At 1.25" wide, this belt is designed to be worn with jeans or dressier pants while retaining a clean and simple design. Has logo embossed near the head of the belt. Everything is cut, punched, assembled, dyed, and finished by hand without the use of machines. Just pure muscle power and traditional methods are used to create a unique item that will age beautifully and last ages. Free monogramming available- up to 3 letters. Send message at checkout if monogramming is desired. Sizing: Order 2 sizes up from your pant size. For example if you wear pants size 30, order a Size 34 belt. Also, Size 34 belt measures 34" from leather at buckle to third closest hole. Materials: -10oz. premium European natural vegetable-tanned leather dyed black -silver-colored brass buckle and rivets Process: -hand cut -hand punched holes -hand stamped logo -hand dyed -hand finished -hand burnished -edges hand dyed *please note: due to the handcrafted nature of this product, there may be slight variations or imperfections that should not be regarded as defects, but as part of the unique character of each lovingly handmade item

name: Zip Wallet in Pull-up Leather
description: We took the extra time to add a more old world luxurious touch to this popular model. Made from dark brown/burgundy pull-up leather that acquires unique lighter colorations with use for a more rugged distressed look. Rub leather to return it to original dark color. Everything is cut, punched, sewn, assembled, and finished by hand without the use of machines. Just pure muscle power and traditional methods are used to create a unique item that will age beautifully and last ages. name: Tackett Moleskine Journal Wallet in pull-up leather
description: This is our flagship product. This design features a Moleskine Volant notebook and guitar pick slots, which was inspired by the lifestyle of one of our best mates. It is made from dark brown/burgundy pull-up leather that acquires unique lighter colorations with use for a more rugged distressed look. Rub leather to return it to original dark color. Everything is cut, punched, sewn, assembled, and finished by hand without the use of machines. Just pure muscle power and traditional methods are used to create a unique item that will age beautifully and last ages. Details: -4 card slots -2 larger slots with pull-tabs for bills, receipts, additional cards -1 included refillable Moleskine Volant notebook in x-small (2.5"x4") -2 guitar pick or coin slots -1 included Fender medium guitar pick -1 dust bag for storage Specs: dimensions: 3"x4.5"x1" material: -dark brown/burgundy pull-up leather -navy grosgrain pull-tabs -heavy duty waxed thread for added strength and durability process: hand cut -stitch channel grooved -hand punched holes -logo heat stamped -assembled and hand stitched with saddle stitch *please note: due to the handcrafted nature of this product, there may be slight variations or imperfections that should not be regarded as defects, but as part of the unique character of each lovingly handmade item Fancy

name: Skeleton Bifold in pull-up Leather
description: This bifold is an exercise in minimalist design. Constructed from a single folded piece of leather with only 2 handsewn seams. Made from dark brown/burgundy pull-up leather that acquires unique lighter colorations with use for a more rugged distressed look. Rub leather to return it to original dark color.
